name: Aimp-control-plugin
tagline: provides network access to AIMP player
body:
This is plugin for [AIMP](http://www.aimp.ru) player - the best free audio player in the world *).

### Purpose

Imaging you have computer with good audio system (for example, your desktop computer) and want to control playback from your notebook, smart phone or whatever. All you need is to launch AIMP player with this plugin and open plugin's page in your browser! 

### Features
  * Convenient installer
  * Settings manager
  * Password protected access
  * Scheduler control
  * Web-based interface in Russian and English
  * Support for all modern desktop browsers
  * Playlists appearance customization for each user
  * Navigation on the track
  * Fast track search  
  * Control playback
  * Details of the current track
  * The transition to the current track in the playlist when changing tracks
  * There is good Android client [AIMP Remote Control](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.invised.aimp.rc)
  * Compatibility with mobile clients: [Aimp Control](https://market.android.com/details?id=com.uas.media.aimp), [AIMP Remote](https://market.android.com/details?id=de.milksplash.aimpremote), [AIMP Mobile Web Control](https://github.com/cheeaun/aimp-mobile-web-ctl) for [Web Control plugin](http://code.google.com/p/aimp-web-ctl)
  * Support for bluetooth
  * Setting track rating in AIMP3
  * Track download
  * Adding tracks/URLs to playlist 
  * Control internet-radio capture

### How to install plugin
See [this page](https://github.com/a0ivanov/aimp-control-plugin/wiki/First-time-launch).

### For client developers
Doc which describes all supported functionality is [here](https://github.com/a0ivanov/aimp-control-plugin/releases/download/v1.0.12.1225/PluginRpcFunctions-1.0.12.1225.chm).
